scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development MODE_ENV=local PORT=4812 sapper dev
scripts.test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test MODE_ENV=local PORT=443 run-p --race dev cy:run
scripts.build:local: cross-env NODE_ENV=production MODE_ENV=local PORT=443 npm run build && npm run start
scripts.build:staging: cross-env NODE_ENV=production MODE_ENV=staging PORT=443 npm run build && npm run start
scripts.build:analyze: cross-env ANALYZE=true NODE_ENV=production MODE_ENV=production PORT=443 npm run dev
scripts.build:production: cross-env NODE_ENV=production MODE_ENV=production PORT=443 npm run build
scripts.start:local: cross-env NODE_ENV=production MODE_ENV=local PORT=443 NODE_EXTRA_CA_CERTS=./secrets/fullchain.cert.pem npm run start --expose-http2
scripts.start:staging: cross-env NODE_ENV=production MODE_ENV=staging PORT=443 NODE_EXTRA_CA_CERTS=./secrets/fullchain.cert.pem npm run start --expose-http2
scripts.start:production: cross-env NODE_ENV=production MODE_ENV=production PORT=443 NODE_EXTRA_CA_CERTS=./secrets/fullchain.cert.pem npm run start --expose-http2
